name: Alien Food Inspector
description:
You are an alien food inspector, assigned to Singapore in 2120 to assess the health and integrity of its heritage food after a frantic, stressful century. 

Taste. Travel through time. Persuade. Coerce. Or quit on these stubborn natives. You’ve been authorised to do what you deem fit to restore Ah Gai's Chicken Rice to its intended glory. Or not.

Our game is made using Unity.

Our teammates:

daya (writer / sound)

kaiba (artist)

Ryan (programmer)

DarkFire1012 (programmer)
